We can easily add a least squares regression line.

.pull-left[
  Estimate the model.
  ```{r}
  lmod <- lm(income ~ yield, barley)
  lmod
  ```
  ]

.pull-right[
  Plot the relationship.
  ``` {r}
  plot(income ~ income, barley, xlim = c(0, 250), ylim = c(0,250))
  abline(lmod, col = 'red')
  ```
  ]
